A Tale of Cherry Blossoms.crystalis_effect: Increases own critical rate by 10% and follow-up attack critical DMG by 20%.
A Tale of Cherry Blossoms.support_effect:
Increases critical rate by 15%.
On battle skill use, increases critical DMG by 5% (Stacks 5 times).

Absolute Rain.crystalis_effect:
Increases critical rate by 20%
On critical hit, increases SPD by 15% (2 turns).
Absolute Rain.support_effect: Increases critical DMG by 18%, and on critical hit, grants 5 MP.

Ashley's Kioku.crystalis_effect: Increases follow-up attack DMG dealt by 40%.

Assault Paranoia.crystalis_effect: Increases critical rate by 20%, and on critical hit, increases break gauge depletion (5) (1 turn), and increases break bonus by 30% (1 turn).
Assault Paranoia.support_effect:
Increases SPD by 20%.
On critical hit, increases break gauge depletion (5) (2 turns).

Asuka's Kioku.crystalis_effect:
On battle skill use, increases DMG dealt by 20% (2 turns).
On enemy break, increases ATK by 10% (2 turns).

Ayame's Kioku.crystalis_effect:
On battle skill use, increases all allies' critical rate by 10% (2 turns).
On critical hit, increases all allies' SPD by 2% (Stacks 5 times / 2 turns).

Baldamente Fortissimo.crystalis_effect:
Increases counterattack break gauge depletion (5).
Adds 1 turn to barrier.
Baldamente Fortissimo.support_effect:
Decreases DMG taken by 7.5%.
On DMG dealt to an enemy, increases DEF by 3.5% (Max 5 stacks).

Bebe-O'-Lantern.crystalis_effect:
Increases ongoing DMG dealt by 40%.
On attack to Candyholic enemy, increases own ATK by 2% (2 turns; max 10 stacks).
Bebe-O'-Lantern.support_effect:
Increases own ongoing DMG dealt by 15%.
Increases SPD by 15%.
On own basic attack, grants 2 MP.

Brilliant Beam.crystalis_effect:
Increases buff effects applied by 20% (* excluding MP recovery and action order advance effects).
On battle skill use, advances action order by 10%.

Buon Natale Grazioso.crystalis_effect:
On battle skill use, grants 5 MP.
When at least 1 ally has Yuletide Gleam, increases SPD by 2%. (Effect increases based on how many allies with Yuletide Gleam are present, max 10%). * Not affected by increases to buff effects.
Buon Natale Grazioso.support_effect:
Increases all allies' DMG dealt by 10%.
On own or ally use of battle skill, increases all allies' ATK by 1.5% (Stacks 10 times).

Cherry Ballad.crystalis_effect:
At battle start, grants 40 MP.
Decreases DMG taken by 2% (Effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max -10%).
Cherry Ballad.support_effect:
At turn start, grants 2 MP.
When 3 or more debuffs are applied to enemies, increases SPD by 25%.

Cherry Blizzard.crystalis_effect:
On DMG dealt to an enemy, grants 1 Magic.
When 5 or more debuffs are applied to enemies, increases SPD by 15%.
Cherry Blizzard.support_effect:
On DMG dealt to an enemy when 2 or more debuffs are applied to enemies, grants 2 MP.
Increases SPD by 20%.

Circle Of Fire.crystalis_effect:
Increases max HP by 10%.
Increases HP recovery amount by 15% for allies under 50% HP.

Concentrated Missile Fire.support_effect: Increases DMG dealt by 15%, and increases follow-up attack and counterattack DMG dealt by 32%.

Dark Art Dominion.support_effect: Increases own battle skill DMG dealt by 15% and SPD by 15.
